post:
ShoveHost, founded in 2011, provides fast and stable Virtual Private Servers based on enterprise-grade servers located at American Internet Services LWDC in San Diego, California. 

For a limited time only, you can get 25% off the price (recurring), and we'll add 25GB of additional disk space to your VPS within 25 hours of the server being setup.

VPS Plans:

  • Economy VPS - 768MB RAM + 256MB vSwap - 20GB 55GB Disk - 1 Core - 250GB Bandwidth - 1 IPv4/10 IPv6 - $10 $7.50/month
  • Standard VPS - 1.5GB RAM + 512MB vSwap - 40GB 65GB Disk - 2 Cores - 500GB Bandwidth - 1 IPv4/10 IPv6 - $20 $15/month
  • Deluxe VPS - 3GB RAM + 1GB vSwap - 80GB 105GB Disk - 3 Cores - 1TB Bandwidth - 1 IPv4/10 IPv6 - $30 $22.50/month
  • Ultimate VPS - 6GB RAM + 2GB vSwap - 160GB 185GB Disk - 4 Cores - 2TB Bandwidth - 2 IPv4/20 IPv6 - $40 $30/month
Simply enter promo code LABORDAY2013 during checkout! But act quickly, this special will become inactive on Wednesday! Thanks for looking and enjoy the rest of your labor day.
